articles.title: Amazon prepares for major layoffs among office workers - reports - BBC
articles.description: If confirmed, the cuts in Amazon's corporate ranks could mark the company's biggest layoffs in several years.

articles.title: Elon Musk launches a Wikipedia rival that extols his own ‘vision’ - The Washington Post
articles.description: The right-leaning tech magnate is touting his own online encyclopedia as an unbiased alternative to the world’s most widely cited online source.

articles.title: Trump administration narrows list of potential Federal Reserve chairs to 5 - AP News
articles.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Monday confirmed the names of five candidates to replace Jerome Powell as chair of the powerful Federal Reserve next year. The names suggest that no matter who is picked, there will likely be big changes coming to the Feder…

articles.title: Statue of Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao Coming to Washington DC After Trump Pardon - Decrypt
articles.description: Anonymous donors said they pooled funds to recognize Binance founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao in Washington, D.C., on Tuesday with a 14-foot-tall statue.

articles.title: Cadence Design Systems Falls Despite Q3 Earnings Beat - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Cadence Design Systems beat Wall Street's targets for the third quarter. But CDNS stock fell in extended trading.

articles.title: Google to Buy Power From NextEra Nuclear Plant Being Revived - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: NextEra Energy Inc. plans to restart a nuclear power plant in Iowa, primarily to supply Google data centers.

articles.title: NYC’s Metro-North Service to Penn Station Delayed by Three Years - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: A $2.9 billion commuter rail project to connect New York City’s northern suburbs to Pennsylvania Station faces a three-year delay, according to the Metropolitan Transportation Authority.

articles.title: ‘Make American Shipbuilding Great Again’: Korea leans into shipbuilding as it woos Trump - Politico
articles.description: A South Korean shipbuilding conglomerate is emerging as a key player in President Donald Trump’s plan to revive America’s fleet and in delicate trade talks that could define the U.S.–Korea alliance.

articles.title: Tesla chair: Elon Musk could leave Tesla without $1 trillion pay package - Axios
articles.description: The chair of Tesla's board is exhorting shareholders to endorse the company's proposed pay package for CEO Elon Musk.

articles.title: Google disputes false claims of massive Gmail data breach - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Google was once again forced to announce that it had not suffered a data breach after numerous news outlets published sensational stories about a fake breach that purportedly exposed 183 million accounts.

articles.title: AMD rises as CEO, Energy Secretary disclosed $1B partnership for supercomputers (AMD:NASDAQ) - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: AMD (AMD) CEO Dr. Lisa Su and Energy Secretary Chris Wright told Reuters the two entities were coming together in a $1B partnership aimed at developing supercomputers. Read for more.

articles.title: Popular cholesterol medication used by millions recalled - MLive.com
articles.description: The recall comes after the maker determined the drug may not dissolve or release its active ingredient in a way that meets regulations and standards.

articles.title: ‘We Are at a Critical Inflection Point for Tesla’ According to CEO Elon Musk. Should You Hold on Tight to TSLA Stock or Jump Ship Now? - Barchart.com
articles.description: Tesla’s Q3 results mark a pivotal shift as Musk doubles down on AI and robotaxis, testing investor patience amid falling margins.

articles.title: Vercel trained an AI agent on its best salesperson. Then it cut the 10-person team down to 1. - businessinsider.com
articles.description: Vercel, a platform for developers, trained an AI agent on the work of its top sales rep, allowing it to move human workers to more creative roles.

articles.title: Walmart Reveals Its Black Friday Schedule for 2025 With an Early Deals Preview - IGN
Discovery Global Plans 2026 Upfront, Assuming Warner Split Happens - Variety
articles.description: Discovery Global Plans 2026 Upfront, Assuming Warner Split Happens

articles.title: Why your beef, bananas and coffee beans have gotten so expensive - CBS News
articles.description: Americans are paying significantly more for these food staples, price inflation data shows. Will inflation ever relent?
